desc: This is an advanced course in the area of political thought. The topic, either a detailed study of major works or themes in political philosophy, will vary with each offering. Prerequisites: Political Science 220 and one course in the subfield.
name: Studies Pol Thought
notes: Open only to Seniors during web registration. Juniors may add with signed drop/add slip on space available basis after web registration.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Political Science 220 and one course in the subfield.
title: Seminar in Political Theory
